EmailTemplate.name: Northam_Event_Defining_Data_Q115.Confirm
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Defining Data in the Cloud Era
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DEFINING DATA IN THE CLOUD ERA A Pivotal Strategy Update HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thanks for registering for Defining Data in the Cloud Era <http://www.pivotal.io/defining-data-in-the-cloud-era>.
The Pivotal offices are located at 875 Howard Street on the 5th floor in San Francisco.
We are looking forward to seeing you there Tuesday, 2/17 from 11:00AM to 12:30PM. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at info@pivotal.io.
Regards,
The Pivotal Team
